name: zombieSecret
description:
In this 2D shooter game some terrorists have discovered that there are gems capable of resurrecting the dead and now they have them in their hands. Everything is ready to bring back to life the dead and the dangerous secrets they had taken to the grave. It's up to you to stop it!

Controls:
- WASD or ARROW KEYS to move.
- LMB for shot.
- E for shop.
- M to mute/unmute.

Game made with Stencyl in 1 month for "The Web Monetization Challenge 2020" . Theme: Secrets.
Sound effects made with Audacity, Bfxr and Freesound.org.
Background musics from PlayOnLoop.com (Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0).
